Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Mystery and Human Meteor's Emergence
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor in an underwater setting and sets up initial conflicts and mysteries.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the underwater setting and the Human Meteor's initial appearance and hinted challenge.

Major_Arcs.title: The Taxi Ride and Escalating Chase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Duke's taxi journey, the introduction of wealthy playboys, and the emergence of a suspicious tail leading to a car chase and Human Meteor's involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi to the Waterfront
sub_scenes.description: Duke picks up wealthy men and agrees to take them to the waterfront.

sub_scenes.title: Suspicious Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Duke notices a G-Man's car following his taxi, creating suspense.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Chase
sub_scenes.description: Arrival at the pier and the G-Man's car speeds past, escalating into a chase.

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor Joins the Action
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor emerges from the G-Man's car, entering the chase.

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation with Cop Shooters and Police Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Human Meteor's confrontation with the 'cop shooters', their apprehension, and the immediate positive police response.

sub_scenes.title: Engagement with Cop Shooters
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor stops the car and confronts the 'cop shooters'.

sub_scenes.title: Police Appreciation and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Police arrive and thank Human Meteor, apprehending the suspects.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Espionage and Toby's Infiltration
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new plot thread involving a yacht and potential espionage, leading to Duke and Toby's plan and Toby's risky infiltration.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital and Yacht Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Dr. Holden reveals suspicions of a yacht and Japanese submarine to Human Meteor.

sub_scenes.title: Duke and Toby's Plan
sub_scenes.description: Duke and Toby devise a plan for Toby to infiltrate the yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Yacht Infiltration and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Toby successfully stows away on the yacht but is quickly spotted.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby Infiltrates the Yacht and is Spotted

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Trap and Submarine Revelation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Toby's experiences on the yacht, including a trap, discovery of a submarine, and reporting back vital information.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck and Cabin Setup
sub_scenes.description: Scene setup on the yacht deck, introducing Pete (Toby) and a diver.

sub_scenes.title: Cabin Trap and Fall
sub_scenes.description: Toby, disguised as Pete, is trapped and falls into the water.

sub_scenes.title: Submarine Sighting and Report
sub_scenes.description: Toby spots the submarine and reports the crucial information to a naval officer.

Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Battle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Human Meteor's response to Toby's intel, his underwater confrontation with divers, and his attack on the submarine and ship.

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor Responds to the Call
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor emerges to act on Toby's report and spots the yacht.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor Responds to the Call

sub_scenes.title: Discovery of Sunken Submarine
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor discovers the sunken Japanese submarine and its cargo.

sub_scenes.title: Submarine Crew's Preparation
sub_scenes.description: Inside the submarine, the crew prepares torpedoes and suspects intruders.

sub_scenes.title: Divers Identify and Attack Human Meteor
sub_scenes.description: Divers spot Human Meteor and decide to attack him.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers Identify and Target Human Meteor
Human Meteor Responds to Divers' Aggression
Diver's Threat and Human Meteor's Retaliation Hint
Spear Gun Attack and Cry for Help

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Torpedo Counter-Attack and Ship Destruction
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor uses a torpedo to attack the submarine and then the ship, leading to chaos on the surface.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor's Torpedo Attack on Submarine
Human Meteor's Finishing Blow to Ship

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Domestic Closure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Human Meteor and Toby's investigation of the yacht, Peter's death, and concludes with a domestic scene providing closure.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Pursuit and Peter's Death
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor pursues the yacht and Peter's death is discovered on board.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter's Death on Yacht

sub_scenes.title: Depth Map Search and Yacht Escape
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor searches for the depth map in Peter's cabin, and Toby makes a quick escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor Searches for Depth Map in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Domestic Scene
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor visits Holden in the hospital, followed by a domestic scene with Duke and Toby.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Car Ride and Domestic Scene with Toby and Duke

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazis and Bus Garage Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to the Liberty Lads confronting Nazis, and a separate mystery involving an ambulance, a dropped wallet, and a suspicious garage.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confront Nazis
sub_scenes.description: Liberty Lads engage in an armed standoff with Nazis.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance and the Dropped Wallet
sub_scenes.description: Boys notice an ambulance and find a dropped wallet leading to investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Salutes Major Bronson Near Garage
sub_scenes.description: Boys witness a Marine saluting a civilian identified as Major Bronson near the bus garage.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Revealed

sub_scenes.title: Garage Interception and Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: Boys are intercepted at the garage and taken to Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Garage and Interception

sub_scenes.title: Horst's Interrogation and Carbon Monoxide Plot
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys, and his associates plot a carbon monoxide murder.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation and Agreement on Carbon Monoxide Plan

sub_scenes.title: Garage Fight and Bronson's Threat
sub_scenes.description: Fighting erupts in the garage, boys are overpowered, and Major Bronson threatens them.

sub_scenes.title: Lawyer's Attack and Horst's Men Turn
sub_scenes.description: Lawyer unexpectedly attacks, and Horst's men turn against Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Escape Plan and Secret Office Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Boys plan to escape and seek help, with Skip discovering a secret office.

narrative_arcs.title: Plan to Seek Help and Sergeant Encounter

sub_scenes.title: Sabotage Plans and Conspiracy Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Chuck finds sabotage plans, and the wider conspiracy is revealed.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Crash and Skip's Defense
sub_scenes.description: Marine barracks under attack, Skip defends himself with books, and Bronson is confronted.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgent News and Car Crash at Barracks

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of Nazi Spy Ring and Major Bronson's Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Liberty Lads' storyline with the arrival of Marines, rescue of Major Bronson, and the dismantling of the Nazi spy ring.

sub_scenes.title: Marines Arrive and Rescue Bronson
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, rescue Major Bronson, and engage the attackers.

narrative_arcs.title: Immediate Aid and Call for Ambulance

sub_scenes.title: Mission Success and Hospital Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Major Bronson recovers in hospital, and the Nazi spy ring is dismantled.

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ in South America and Rosita's Kidnapping
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' in a new setting, entangled in intrigue related to Rosita's kidnapping and Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to 'The Champ' and Henry in South America, facing 'Hitler tools'.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting

sub_scenes.title: Military Interrogation and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Military interrogates 'The Champ' and Henry, revealing Rosita's kidnapping.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Demands and Carjacking
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre's demands are discussed, and 'The Champ' and Henry are carjacked.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Demands and Forced Carjacking
The Forced Drive and Destination Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding and Tamale Street Planning
sub_scenes.description: Mama's plea to the kidnapped Americans and separate planning at Tamale Street.

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Confrontation at El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: Infiltration of El Tigre's hideout and initial confrontations.

narrative_arcs.title: Claim of Identity Theft by Axis Agents
Rosita Held by Axis Agents, Rescue Plan
Escape to Citadel and Hotel Strategy

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, his disobedience, and his mission involving sub detector plans and native tribes.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Fight and Disobeyed Orders
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan fights in the jungle, and officers discuss his disobeyed orders.

sub_scenes.title: River Journey and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Mission talk on a river arrival and a jungle trek leading to a native ambush.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle River Journey and Perceived Danger

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Capture and Torture for Plans
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured and interrogated, facing torture to reveal the sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Sabotage and Native Hut Burning
sub_scenes.description: Dolan continues sabotage, setting fires, and Grauer plans to eliminate natives.

narrative_arcs.title: Marines' Onslaught and Grauer's Strategic Talk
Grauer's Dismissal and Native Hut Burning

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Camp Attack and Native Chief's Demise
sub_scenes.description: Dolan attacks native camp, leading to a fight and the accidental death of the chief.

sub_scenes.title: Native Submission and New Mission
sub_scenes.description: Natives submit after chief's death, revealing betrayal and setting up a new mission.

sub_scenes.title: Ship Surrender and Father-Son Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Surrender orders on a ship lead to a confrontation between captain and 'Devil Dog'.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Murder of Robert Burgess
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them through newsrooms, police stations, hospitals, and into the heart of a criminal conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins Story
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the 'Twinkle Twins' and the setting of their new story.

sub_scenes.title: Newsroom Investigation Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Briefing at the Weston newspaper office about the Robert Burgess murder.

sub_scenes.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
sub_scenes.description: Inquiry at the police station leads to a hospital lead regarding Guy Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Miss Reilly's Condition
sub_scenes.description: Hospital visit reveals Miss Reilly's condition and the need for a rare blood type.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Suspicions and Farnacci Link
sub_scenes.description: Suspicions of racketeering arise, and Farnacci's potential involvement is discussed.

sub_scenes.title: Search for Tom Reilly and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Search for Tom Reilly leads to Mrs. Murphy, who reveals crucial information about Farnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly and Initial Encounter
Conversation with Mrs. Murphy about Farnacci

sub_scenes.title: Chase and Blockade in Irish Neighborhood
sub_scenes.description: Pursuit of Tom Reilly leads to a chase and a human blockade in the Irish section.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Chase of Tom Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Emergency and Community Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: Police action and medical emergency response, leading to a community blood donation effort.

narrative_arcs.title: Rushed to Ambulance and Onward Concern
Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion News
Community Rushes to Donate and Hospital Anxiety
Blood Type Confirmation, Transfusion Preparation, and Recovery

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Anticipation of future discussion and Lassie Reilly's birthday celebration marking a happy resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Threats and Determination to Capture Farnacci
Police Respond and Arrest the Murderer
